title: New Universe Layout

embed.description: Separate, but never parted, Kindred represents the twin essences of death. Lamb's bow offers a swift release from the mortal realm for those who accept their fate. Wolf hunts down those who run from their end, delivering violent finality within his crushing jaws.

body:
I just today noticed that the page layout for stories/bios on Universe had changed.  It now shows the progress bar as you scroll through the story on the left-hand side.  It also shows the "cover" image and the title when you first open the page; these then disappear once you scroll down to the story itself.  It may have changed within the past few days, but I've had a tab open with a story for about a week now meaning to read it.  So it'd definitely pretty recent.

I also noticed that in certain bios/stories with 4 "related champions" listed at the bottom, the circles are cut off for some reason.  Check the bottom of Kindred's bio for an example.

replies.body:
Yes, we did indeed update the story reader recently! We've got a fix for the cutoff circles coming this week.

I really appreciate the feedback on the blurred background being distracting. I agree that's a bit strong, especially on stories with a light colored background image. I will see what they think about making it more subtle.

Let me know if you have any other feedback on it!

>
> Yes, we did indeed update the story reader recently! We've got a fix for the cutoff circles coming this week.
> 
> I really appreciate the feedback on the blurred background being distracting. I agree that's a bit strong, especially on stories with a light colored background image. I will see what they think about making it more subtle.
> 
> Let me know if you have any other feedback on it!

In the mean time, some of the splash arts used for the background when reading Champion bios are lower resolution than others. A bit of a nitpick, but it takes away from the beauty of the lore and art coming together in this amazing format, if the art is really pixelated and choppy...

Either way, absolutely LOVE this new format!

> [{quoted}](name=BonzaiBuddy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PguBcOVE,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2019-01-15T22:51:15.560+0000)
>

> 
> Either way, absolutely LOVE this new format!

Glad you love the new format! 

That's totally fair. Some of the images are a bit blurry. I will bring this back to the team and make sure it's on our roadmap to fix it, but I can't make any promises about when.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Biomarker,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PguBcOVE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-01-15T09:01:35.307+0000)
>
> Yes, we did indeed update the story reader recently! We've got a fix for the cutoff circles coming this week.
> 
> I really appreciate the feedback on the blurred background being distracting. I agree that's a bit strong, especially on stories with a light colored background image. I will see what they think about making it more subtle.
> 
> Let me know if you have any other feedback on it!

It would also help to have some links to the characters other related stories easily accessed from an already opened story window. Like I opened up Kindreds Bio or short story, but I also like to have a short link for "A quick Death" story just at the end of my story read. 

Plus it would really be great if you could add related stories in champions universe pages (stories where they are mentioned or have a supporting role in the story). Like I would really like to know which stories Kindred pops up in any shape or form from their main Universe page so I can read those about my favorite Death animals. (like they are several where they are mentioned, like the Noxian one, Ezreal field notes, demacian stuff, etc.)

> [{quoted}](name=Tesla Effect,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PguBcOVE,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2019-01-15T10:30:03.087+0000)
>
> It would also help to have some links to the characters other related stories easily accessed from an already opened story window. Like I opened up Kindreds Bio or short story, but I also like to have a short link for "A quick Death" story just at the end of my story read. 
> 
> Plus it would really be great if you could add related stories in champions universe pages (stories where they are mentioned or have a supporting role in the story). Like I would really like to know which stories Kindred pops up in any shape or form from their main Universe page so I can read those about my favorite Death animals. (like they are several where they are mentioned, like the Noxian one, Ezreal field notes, demacian stuff, etc.)

Going off of that, I just read Garen's color story, which is directly references Lux, as their relationship is the drive of the story.  Since it's not "her" story, I can see why it wouldn't be on her page, but I think someone who is interested in Lux would be interested in that story, for example.
I think there should be some kind of separation between stories that are "about" that character and stories where they play a small role, although you then have to decide where to draw the line, which is difficult.

Thanks again for the feedback. We disabled the blurry background on the comic reader for now. We might investigate bringing it back in the future, but in a way that doesn't interfere with the reading experience. 

@Tesla Effect & @Larriet Totally agree it would be awesome to have easier avenues to find content related to a champion.

I personally really liked the background feature but I see why people wouldn't like it. A bit strange but I personally think a toggle would be nice, but it's such a minute feature that we might as well just go one way or the other.

Looks like the layout has shrunk the passages of writing, as there's a lot of empty space to the sides. 

At least the passages fit the screen better on mobile.

I don't like how you can see an extremely blurry version of the cover image behind the story at all times, it just really bugs me...
And the empty space around the story is much more noticeable because of the smaller words and more compact layout
I agree the blur is so distracting
Yeah, it looks like it still needs some work.
